RuleTitle: ['Event Description', 'Confirm Research', 'Research Reward Type', 'Research Probabilities', 'Guaranteed to get 1 Special Reward every 20 attempts', 'Research Milestone Rewards', 'Research Expiration Refund']
RuleText: ['The event consists of [Tsubaki], [Solitary Longings], and [Solitary Dream]. You can choose one from these three Coatings to research.', 'You may choose one of the Coatings to research. Once selected, it cannot be changed again.', 'There are two types of rewards: Special Reward and Common Reward. Each draw will be determined by the rates.', 'Special Reward: 1%  Common Reward: 99%.', 'All special rewards have limited quantities. They will no longer be available once they are drawn.', 'Reach the following numbers of researches to obtain the corresponding rewards:\\n    50 Researches: Weapon Coating\\n    70 Researches: Portrait\\n    90 Researches: Portrait Frame', 'After the event, the unused [Research Items] will be converted into Basic Construct R&D Tickets at a ratio of 1:175.']
